releaseNotes:
•	Compiled with VS 2015 Community edition and .Net 4.5.2.
      •	RequestAttributeValueUpdate is renamed and re-implemented for the objects as well as the object classes. Now it also supports the attribute sets.
      •	States are re-implemented as Flags. Now it is possible to combine states.
summary: The RTI abstraction component for .NET (RACoN) deals with the High Level Architecture (HLA) runtime infrastructure (RTI) communication in order to access the federation-wide data (actually, the objects and interactions exchanged in federation). RTI is middleware broker software that manages the federation execution and object exchange through a federation execution. The RACoN provides the .NET wrapper classes for the RTI and RTI-specific data structures. As it offers more maintainable, robust, and portable methods, developing an abstraction layer (wrapper) over RTI is a popular approach in many HLA-based projects.
title: RACoN
